CustomField.inlineHelpText: Batch size for the scheduled share process. In order to meet the SF SOQL Limit, apply the following to determine the optimal batch size. * Find the criteria set with the most criteria assignments and use the count., add 1 for process overhead. Divide 200 by this number and subtract 1 for startup. * Set the Batch Size to (200 / (max_criteria + 1)) - 1 ex: Max criteria = 5. * Use (200 / 6) -1 (rounded down to the nearest Integer) * set Batch Size = 32
CustomField.label: Batch Size
